verbs.description: [ARG2: Eighteen Republican members of Congress] — [V: including] [ARG1: U.S. Rep. Matt Gaetz] — sent a letter nominating Trump to receive the Nobel Peace Prize .
[ARG0: Eighteen Republican members of Congress — including U.S. Rep. Matt Gaetz —] [V: sent] [ARG1: a letter nominating Trump to receive the Nobel Peace Prize] .
Eighteen Republican members of Congress — including U.S. Rep. Matt Gaetz — sent [ARG0: a letter] [V: nominating] [ARG1: Trump] to receive the Nobel Peace Prize .
Eighteen Republican members of Congress — including U.S. Rep. Matt Gaetz — sent a letter nominating [ARG0: Trump] to [V: receive] [ARG1: the Nobel Peace Prize] .
